name: LocalExchangeUK
short_description:
LocalExchangeUK is a fork of Calvin Priest's original Local Exchange source code tailored specifically for UK LETS groups . Written in PHP/MySQL, this software provides an interactive website for LETS (Local Exchange Trading System) groups. 

***********************************************************************
N.B. Active development of this package has now been moved to GitHub - see Project Homepage link below.
***********************************************************************
summary: a fork of Calvin Priest's original Local Exchange source code
